name: Abathur
title: Evolution Master
description: Does not directly engage in combat, but rather can act through his allied Heroes and Minions and place Toxic Nests to defend important locations.

Abathur.name: Symbiote
Abathur.description:
Assist another allied Unit or Combat Structure, allowing you to shield them and use new Abilities.
Cannot be used on another Hero's Summons.

Abathur.name: Toxic Nest
Abathur.description: Spawn a mine that becomes active after a short time. Deals 153 (+0.04 per level) damage and reveals the enemy for 4 seconds. Lasts 90 seconds.

Abathur.name: Evolve Monstrosity
Abathur.description:
Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 5% Health and 5% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 30 times.  The Monstrosity takes 50% less damage from non-Heroic enemies.
Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows you to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.  This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on your Monstrosity.

Abathur.name: Ultimate Evolution
Abathur.description: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Ability Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

Abathur.name: Locust Strain
Abathur.description: Spawns a Locust to attack down the nearest lane every 15 seconds. Locusts last for 25 seconds.

Abathur.name: Deep Tunnel
Abathur.description: Quickly tunnel to a visible location

AbathurSymbiote.name: Stab
AbathurSymbiote.description: Shoots a spike towards target area that deals 113 (+0.04 per level) damage to the first enemy it contacts.

AbathurSymbiote.name: Spike Burst
AbathurSymbiote.description: Deals 111 (+0.04 per level) damage to nearby enemies.

AbathurSymbiote.name: Carapace
AbathurSymbiote.description: Shields the assisted ally for 137 (+0.04 per level). Lasts for 8 seconds.

AbathurSymbiote.name: Cancel Symbiote
AbathurSymbiote.description: Cancels the Symbiote ability. Releases your ally and returns to controlling Abathur.

1.name: Pressurized Glands
1.description: Increases the range of Symbiote's Spike Burst by 25% and decreases the cooldown by 1 second.

1.name: Survival Instincts
1.description: Increases Locust's Health by 50% and duration by 40%.

1.name: Regenerative Microbes
1.description: Symbiote's Carapace heals the target for 31 (+0.04 per level) Health per second.

1.name: Envenomed Nest
1.description: Toxic Nests deal 75% (+0.0588% per level) more damage over 3 seconds.

4.name: Prolific Dispersal
4.description: Reduces the cooldown of Toxic Nest by 2 seconds and adds 2 additional charges.

4.name: Ballistospores
4.description: Increases Toxic Nest's range to global and increases duration by 20%.

4.name: Sustained Carapace
4.description: Increases the duration of Symbiote's Carapace by 50% and allows it to persist after Symbiote ends.

4.name: Adrenal Overload
4.description: Symbiote host gains 25% increased Attack Speed.

7.name: Needlespine
7.description: Increases the damage and range of Symbiote's Stab by 20%.

7.name: Vile Nest
7.description: Toxic Nests slow enemy Movement Speed by 50% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Networked Carapace
7.description: Using Symbiote's Carapace on a Minion or Mercenary also applies Carapace to all nearby allied Minions and Mercenaries.

7.name: Calldown: MULE
7.description: Activate to calldown a Mule that repairs Structures, one at a time, near target point for 40 seconds, healing for 100 Health every 1 second.  Grants 1 ammo every  3 seconds.

10.name: Ultimate Evolution
10.description: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Ability Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

10.name: Evolve Monstrosity
10.description:
Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 5% Health and 5% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 30 times.  The Monstrosity takes 50% less damage from non-Heroic enemies.
Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows you to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.  This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on your Monstrosity.

13.name: Assault Strain
13.description: Locust Basic Attacks cleave for 50% (+0.0588% per level) damage, and explode on death for 68 (+0.04 per level) damage.

13.name: Bombard Strain
13.description: Locust's Basic Attacks become a long-range siege attack that deal 70% (-0.0823% per level) more damage.

13.name: Spatial Efficiency
13.description: Symbiote's Stab gains 1 additional charge.

13.name: Soma Transference
13.description: Symbiote's Spike Burst heals the host for 64 (+0.04000000000001 per level) Health per enemy Hero hit.

16.name: Envenomed Spikes
16.description: Your Symbiote's Spike Burst also slows enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2 seconds.

16.name: Adrenaline Boost
16.description: Symbiote's Carapace increases the Movement Speed of the target by 40% for 3 seconds.

16.name: Locust Brood
16.description: Activate to spawn 3 Locusts at a nearby location.

16.name: Volatile Mutation
16.description: Ultimate Evolution clones and Monstrosities deal 114 (+0.04 per level) damage to nearby enemies every 3 seconds and when they die.

20.name: Evolutionary Link
20.description: As long as the Ultimate Evolution is alive, the original target of the clone gains a Shield equal to 20% of their maximum Health.  Refreshes every 5 seconds.

20.name: Evolution Complete
20.description: Monstrosity gains the ability to Deep Tunnel to any visible location once every 30 seconds.

20.name: Hivemind
20.description: Symbiote creates an additional Symbiote on a nearby allied Hero.  This Symbiote mimics the commands of the first.

20.name: Locust Nest
20.description: Activate to create a nest that periodically spawns Locusts. Only one Locust Nest can be active at a time.

name: Anub'arak
title: Traitor King
description: Burrow Charges toward enemies and Impales targets. Regrows carapace to shield himself.

Anubarak.name: Impale
Anubarak.description: Deals 100 (+0.04 per level) damage. Stuns for 1 second.

Anubarak.name: Harden Carapace
Anubarak.description: Gain a Shield that absorbs 242 (+0.04 per level) damage over 3 seconds.

Anubarak.name: Burrow Charge
Anubarak.description: Burrows to location, dealing 107 (+0.04 per level) damage and briefly stunning enemies in a small area upon surfacing. Can reactivate the Ability to surface early.

Anubarak.name: Locust Swarm
Anubarak.description: Deal 66 (+0.04 per level) damage per second in an area around yourself. Each enemy damaged heals you for 18 (+0.04 per level) Health. Lasts 8 seconds.

Anubarak.name: Cocoon
Anubarak.description: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for 8 seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.

Anubarak.name: Scarab Host
Anubarak.description: Spawn a Beetle at your location whenever you use an ability. Beetles last for 8 seconds, attacking nearby enemies for 20 (+0.04 per level) damage.

1.description: Increases the max range of Impale by 25%.

1.name: Persistent Carapace
1.description: Increases Harden Carapace's Shield duration by 3 seconds.

1.name: Assault Scarab
1.description: Increases the attack damage of spawned Beetles by 25%.

1.description: Collecting Regeneration Globes permanently increases Health Regeneration by 1.5 per second.

4.name: Underking
4.description: Increases the range of Burrow Charge by 20% and lowers the cooldown by 2 seconds.

4.name: Mercenary Lord
4.description: Non-Boss Mercenaries near your hero deal 50% more damage. Reduces damage taken from Minions and Mercenaries by 50%.

4.name: Locust Needles
4.description: Basic Attacks deal 50% of your Basic Attack Damage in an area around the target.

4.name: Legion of Beetles
4.description: Anub'arak automatically spawns Beetles every 8 seconds.  Can be toggled on and off.

7.name: Shed Exoskeleton
7.description: Gain 25% increased Move Speed for 3 seconds.

7.name: Urticating Spines
7.description: Casting Harden Carapace will also deal 105 (+0.04 per level) damage to nearby enemies.

7.name: Bed of Barbs
7.description: Create a bed of spikes along Impale's path that slows enemy Move Speed by 30% and deals 26 (+0.04 per level) damage per second.  Spikes persist for 3.5 seconds.

7.name: Leeching Scarabs
7.description: Beetles heal you for 50% of their damage with each attack if you are nearby.

10.description: Deal 66 (+0.04 per level) damage per second in an area around yourself. Each enemy damaged heals you for 18 (+0.04 per level) Health. Lasts 8 seconds.

13.name: Burning Rage
13.description: Deal 23 (+0.04 per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

13.name: Chitinous Plating
13.description: Increases Harden Carapace's Shield amount by 40%.

13.name: Symbiotic Armor
13.description: Anub'arak's Beetles are also granted a Shield equal to 242 (+0.04 per level).

13.name: Spell Shield
13.description: Upon taking Ability Damage, reduce that damage and further Ability Damage by 50% for 3 seconds.  Can only trigger once every 30 seconds.

16.name: Epicenter
16.description: Increases the impact area and damage of Burrow Charge by 85%.

16.name: Beetle, Juiced
16.description: If a Beetle kills an enemy its duration is refreshed, it is fully healed, and gains 100% bonus Health and damage.  This effect can only occur once per Beetle.

16.name: Imposing Presence
16.description: Enemies that attack you have their Attack Speed slowed by 40%.

16.name: Blood for Blood
16.description: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and heal for twice that amount.

20.name: Hive Master
20.description: Anub'arak gains a permanent Vampire Locust that attacks a nearby enemy every 3 seconds. The Vampire Locust deals 153 (+0.04 per level) damage and returns to heal Anub'arak for 37 (+0.04 per level) health.

20.name: Cryptweave
20.description: Gain the ability to channel on Cocoon victims for 4 seconds to increase the duration by 4 seconds.  Usable once per Cocoon.

20.name: Hardened Shield
20.description: Activate to reduce damage taken by 75% for 4 seconds.

20.name: Rewind
20.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

name: Artanis
title: Hierarch of the Daelaam
description: A duelist warrior that gains a shield automatically at low health. Repositions enemies and strikes with his blades.

Artanis.name: Blade Dash
Artanis.description: Dash forward and deal 57 (+0.04 per level) damage to enemies, then return and deal 171 (+0.04 per level) damage.

Artanis.name: Twin Blades
Artanis.description: Your next Basic Attack immediately strikes the enemy 2 times.

Artanis.name: Phase Prism
Artanis.description: Fire a Phase Prism that deals 66 (+0.04 per level) damage to Heroes and swaps your position with theirs.

Artanis.name: Purifier Beam
Artanis.description: Target an enemy Hero with an orbital beam from the Spear of Adun, dealing 184 (+0.16 per level) damage per second for 8 seconds. The beam will chase the target as they move.  Unlimited range.

Artanis.name: Suppression Pulse
Artanis.description: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing 114 (+0.04 per level) damage and Blinding enemies for 4 seconds. Unlimited range.

Artanis.name: Shield Overload
Artanis.description: If you take damage while below 50% Health, gain a 449 (+0.04 per level) point Shield for 5 seconds. Your Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Shield Overload by 4 seconds.

1.description: If Phase Prism misses, reduce the cooldown by 8 seconds and refund 100% of the Mana.

1.description: Twin Blades attacks deal 100% bonus damage to non-Heroes.

1.name: Seasoned Marksman
1.description: For every 6 enemy Minion kills near your Hero, gain 1 Basic Attack damage. Hero Takedowns count as 3 Minion kills.

4.description: Reduces Shield Overload's cooldown by 6 seconds if it lasts for the full duration.

7.description: Phase Prism also slows the enemy's Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.

13.name: Burning Rage
13.description: Deal 23 (+0.04 per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

16.name: Shield Surge
16.description: Increases Shield Overload's Shields by 50%, but decays to the normal amount over 3 seconds.

16.name: Zealot Charge
16.description: While Twin Blades is active, you charge a short distance to your target.

16.name: Titan Killer
16.description: Twin Blades attacks against Heroes deal an additional 2.5% of the target's maximum Health in damage.

16.name: Psionic Wound

20.name: Orbital Bombardment
20.description: Suppression Pulse gains an additional charge.  There is a 10 second cooldown between uses.

20.name: Target Purified
20.description: If the target of Purifier Beam dies, it automatically recasts on the nearest visible enemy Hero.

20.name: Force of Will
20.description: Increases Shield Overload's cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks to 6 seconds.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

name: Arthas
title: The Lich King
description: Engages with his enemies directly, freezing and slowing them. Uses the power of Frostmourne to empower his attacks.

Arthas.description:
Deals 164 (+0.04 per level) damage to target enemy.

Azmodan.description: Create a pool that empowers Azmodan, his Demons, and allied Minions, increasing their attack and ability damage by 75%. Pools last 5 seconds.

Azmodan.description:
Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 55 (+0.04 per level) damage per impact. Demon Grunts deal 27 (+0.04 per level) damage and have 365 (+0.04 per level) health.
Damage is doubled versus non-Heroic targets.

Azmodan.description: Summon a Demon Lieutenant at an allied Mercenary, Minion, or Summon. The Lieutenant will march with the target, granting 15% increased damage and 15% increased maximum Health to all nearby friendly Mercenaries, Minions, and Summons. Unlimited range.

title: Faerie Dragon

name: Butcher

description: Gathers meat from fallen enemies to gain power, brutally assaulting his enemies.

7.description: Increases Runic Blast's damage by 5% everytime you get a Hero takedown, up to 20%. These bonuses are lost upon dying.

10.name: Shadow Bolt Volley

16.name: Shadowflare
16.description: Increases Shadowflame's width by 50%. Enemies hit are slowed by 25% for 1 second.

20.description: Shadow Bolt Volley hits all enemies in its path.

20.name: The Nether Calls
20.description: Increases Twisting Nether's slow by 10% and damage by 10% for every second channeled, to a maximum of 40% increase.

20.name: Psychotic Break
20.description: Increases your Ability Damage by 5%. Upon dying, the cooldown on your Heroic Ability is reset and you can continue to use Abilities for 10 seconds.

name: Gazlowe
title: Boss of Ratchet
description: Specializes in zoning out his enemies and securing areas with Turrets and XPlodium Charges. Can supercharge his Deth Lazor for increased area of effect damage.

Tinker.name: Rock-It! Turret
Tinker.description: Creates a turret that deals 68 (+0.04 per level) damage. Lasts for 30 seconds.

Tinker.name: Deth Lazor
Tinker.description: Charged attack that deals 137 (+0.04 per level) to 274 (+0.04 per level) damage to enemies in a line. Damage and range increase the longer the Ability is charged, reaching maximum power after 3 seconds.

Tinker.name: Xplodium Charge
Tinker.description: Places a bomb that deals 212 (+0.04 per level) damage to enemies within target area after 2.5 seconds, stunning them for 2 seconds.

Tinker.name: Robo-Goblin
Tinker.description: Basic Attacks deal an additional 150% damage to non-Heroes.

Tinker.name: Grav-O-Bomb 3000
Tinker.description: After a 2 second delay, pull enemies toward the center of an area and deal 251 (+0.04 per level) damage.

Tinker.name: Salvager
Tinker.description:
Destroyed enemy Structures and your Rock-it! Turrets drop scrap. Collecting scrap restores 30 Mana and causes his Abilities to cooldown twice as fast for 3.07 seconds. 
Activate Salvager to dismantle a target Rock-it! Turret and turn it into scrap.

1.name: Regeneration Master
1.description: Collecting Regeneration Globes permanently increases Health Regeneration by 1.5 per second.

1.name: Scrap-o-Matic Smelter
1.description: Increases the amount of Mana restored by scrap to 60.

1.name: Break it Down!
1.description: Scrap causes Abilities to cooldown three times as fast for 3.07 seconds.

1.name: Extra TNT
1.description: Xplodium Charge damage increased by 10% per target hit, to a max of 100% increased damage.

1.name: Demolitionist
1.description: Basic Attacks against Structures destroy 1 ammo and deal an additional 10% damage.

4.name: Mercenary Lord
4.description: Non-Boss Mercenaries near your hero deal 50% more damage. Reduces damage taken from Minions and Mercenaries by 50%.

4.name: Reduce, Reuse, Recycle
4.description: Enemy Minions and Structures that die near you have a 15% chance to drop scrap.

4.name: Clockwerk Steam Fists
4.description: Basic Attacks increase the duration of active Rock-It! Turrets by 1.5 seconds.

4.name: Goblin Fusion
4.description: Deth Lazor gains an additional charge level after reaching max size, which increases the damage dealt by 50%.

4.name: Promote
4.description: Activate to cause an allied lane Minion to take 75% reduced damage from non-Heroic targets and deal 100% bonus damage to non-Heroic targets for 30 seconds. Has 2 charges.

7.name: Rock-It! Turret XL
7.description: Turrets attack up to 2 additonal targets for 50% (+0.0294% per level) damage.

7.name: Engine Gunk
7.description: Turret attacks slow Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

7.name: First Aid
7.description: Activate to heal 35.49% of your max Health over 6 seconds.

7.name: Calldown: MULE
7.description: Activate to calldown a Mule that repairs Structures, one at a time, near target point for 40 seconds, healing for 100 Health every 1 second.  Grants 1 ammo every  3 seconds.

10.name: Robo-Goblin
10.description: Basic Attacks deal an additional 150% damage to non-Heroes.

10.name: Grav-O-Bomb 3000
10.description: After a 2 second delay, pull enemies toward the center of an area and deal 251 (+0.04 per level) damage.

13.name: Burning Rage
13.description: Deal 23 (+0.04 per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

13.name: Turret Storage
13.description: Max Turret charges increased to 3.

13.name: EZ-PZ Dimensional Ripper
13.description: Deth Lazor slows Heroes by 40% and freezes Minions or Structures for 3 seconds.

13.name: Sprint
13.description: Activate to gain 75% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

16.name: Long-Ranged Turrets
16.description: Turret range increased by 40%.

16.name: Kwik Release Charge
16.description: Increased number of Bomb charges to 2.

16.name: Hyperfocus Coils
16.description: Deth Lazor charges twice as fast.

16.name: Stoneskin
16.description: Activate to gain 30% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 5 seconds.

20.name: Mecha-Lord
20.description: Basic attacks deal an additional 150% damage to Heroes.

20.name: Miniature Black Hole
20.description: Grav-O-Bomb radius increased by 25% and damage increased by 50%.

20.name: Fury of the Storm
20.description: Every 5 seconds, your next basic attack will deal an additional 91 (+0.04 per level) damage to the target, and 228 (+0.04 per level) damage to all nearby Minions and Mercenaries.

20.name: Hardened Shield
20.description: Activate to reduce damage taken by 75% for 4 seconds.

name: Greymane
title: Lord of the Worgen
description: A shapeshifting Hero who can wear his opponents down from afar, before leaping in as a Worgen to finish them when they're vulnerable.

Greymane.name: Razor Swipe
Greymane.description:
Swipe towards the area in front of you for 159 (+0.04 per level) damage.
Human: Gilnean Cocktail
Damage the first enemy hit and deal heavy damage behind them.

Greymane.name: Gilnean Cocktail
Greymane.description:
Hurl a flask that deals 69 (+0.04 per level) damage to the first enemy hit and explodes for 207 (+0.04 per level) damage to enemies in a cone behind them.
Worgen: Razor Swipe
Swipe forward and damage enemies you pass through.

Greymane.name: Inner Beast
Greymane.description: Gain 50% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh this duration.

Greymane.name: Disengage
Greymane.description:
Roll away and shapeshift into a Human.
Human: Darkflight
Leap at an enemy and shapeshift into a Worgen.

Greymane.name: Darkflight
Greymane.description:
Shapeshift into a Worgen and leap at an enemy dealing 88 (+0.04 per level) damage.
Worgen: Disengage
Roll away and shapeshift into a Human.

Greymane.name: Go for the Throat
Greymane.description: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing 3 times for 375 (+0.12 per level) total damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

Greymane.name: Marked for the Kill
Greymane.description: Shapeshift into a Human and fire a shot hitting the first enemy Hero for 68 (+0.04 per level) damage. For 5 seconds, they are Vulnerable, taking 25% more damage, and you can re-activate this to leap at them and shapeshift into a Worgen.

Greymane.name: Curse of the Worgen
Greymane.description:
Use certain Abilities to shapeshift between a Human and a Worgen.
While Human, your Basic Attack is ranged.
While Worgen, your Basic Attack is melee but deals 39.8551% (-0.0116% per level) more damage.

1.name: Wolfheart
1.description: While Inner Beast is active, each Basic Attack lowers its cooldown by 1 second.

1.name: Perfect Aim
1.description: Increases Gilnean Cocktail's range by 30.3571% and refunds 50 Mana if it hits an enemy Hero.

1.name: Scented Tincture
1.description: Gilnean Cocktail reveals enemy Heroes for 10 seconds.

1.name: Viciousness
1.description: Increases Inner Beast's duration to 4 seconds, and causes Ability damage to also refresh its duration.

4.name: Thick Skin
4.description: Using Darkflight reduces the damage of the next 2 Heroic Basic Attacks made against you by 50% while a Worgen.

4.name: Eyes in the Dark
4.description: Disengage grants Stealth for 4 seconds.

4.name: Insatiable
4.description: Inner Beast causes Basic Attacks to restore 5 Mana, up to 140.

4.name: Draught Overflow
4.description: Increases Gilnean Cocktail's explosion length by 35%.

7.name: Quicksilver Bullets
7.description: Increases Human Basic Attack range by 20%.

7.description: Gilnean Cocktail deals 200% more damage to the enemy it impacts and explodes even if it misses.

10.name: Go for the Throat

10.name: Marked for the Kill

13.name: Running Wild
13.description: Increases Darkflight and Disengage's range by 35%.

13.name: Visceral Attacks
13.description: Worgen Basic Attacks reduce Razor Swipe's cooldown by 1 second.

13.name: On the Prowl
13.description: Inner Beast increases your Movement Speed by 30% once it has been active for 3 seconds.

13.name: Unfettered Assault
13.description: Increases Razor Swipe's lunge distance by 60%.

16.name: Concentrated Blast
16.description: Increases Gilnean Cocktail's damage by 80% while Inner Beast is active.

16.name: Relentless Predator
16.description: Reduces the duration of silences, stuns, slows, roots, and polymorphs against you by 75% while in Worgen form.

16.name: Executioner
16.description: Basic Attacks deal 40% more damage against slowed, rooted, or stunned targets.

16.name: Alpha Killer
16.description: Worgen Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 3% of the Hero's maximum Health.

20.name: Unleashed
20.description: If the free cast of Go for the Throat kills its target, another free cast is provided.

20.name: Gilnean Roulette
20.description: Marked for the Kill passes through enemy Heroes, making all of them Vulnerable and allowing Leap to be used on each marked target once. The closest target is preferred.

20.name: Hunter's Blunderbuss
20.description: Human Basic Attacks splash for 100% damage behind the target.

20.name: Tooth and Claw
20.description: Worgen Basic Attacks cleave for 100% damage.

name: Illidan
title: The Betrayer
description: Darts around the battlefield, evading attacks and relentlessly pursuing enemies.

Illidan.name: Dive
Illidan.description: Dive at the target, dealing 66 (+0.04 per level) damage and flipping to the other side of the target.

Illidan.name: Sweeping Strike
Illidan.description: Dash towards target point, dealing 119 (+0.04 per level) damage to enemies along the way. If you hit an enemy, Basic Attacks do 35% more damage for 4 seconds.

Illidan.name: Evasion
Illidan.description: Evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2 seconds.

Illidan.name: The Hunt
Illidan.description: Charge to target unit, dealing 251 (+0.04 per level) damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.

Illidan.name: Metamorphosis
Illidan.description: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 46 (+0.04 per level) damage in the area. Gain 183 (+0.04 per level) temporary max Health for each Hero hit and 20% increased Attack Speed. Lasts for 18 seconds.

Illidan.name: Betrayer's Thirst
Illidan.description: Basic Attacks heal for 20% of damage dealt and reduce your Ability cooldowns by 1 second.

1.name: Battered Assault
1.description: Increases the Basic Attack bonus of Sweeping Strike to 50%.

1.name: Shadow Shield
1.description: Evasion grants a 143 (+0.04 per level) point Shield for 5 seconds.

1.name: Regeneration Master
1.description: Collecting Regeneration Globes permanently increases Health Regeneration by 1.5 per second.

4.description: Increases the range of Sweeping Strike by 20%.

4.description: After using Sweeping Strike, burn nearby enemies for 29 (+0.04 per level) damage a second for 4 seconds.

4.name: Thirsting Blade
4.description: Healing from Basic Attacks increased to 30% of damage dealt.

7.name: Rapid Chase
7.description: Gain 20% Movement Speed for 2.1875 seconds after using Dive.

7.name: Reflexive Block
7.description: Gain 2 charges of Block (50% reduced Basic Attack damage) after Evasion wears off. Lasts 5 seconds.

7.description: After using an ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

7.description: Activate to double the cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks for 8 seconds.

7.name: First Aid
7.description: Activate to heal 35.49% of your max Health over 6 seconds.

10.name: Metamorphosis
10.description: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 46 (+0.04 per level) damage in the area. Gain 183 (+0.04 per level) temporary max Health for each Hero hit and 20% increased Attack Speed. Lasts for 18 seconds.

10.description: Charge to target unit, dealing 251 (+0.04 per level) damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.

13.name: Giant Killer
13.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

13.name: Lunge
13.description: Increases the range of Dive by 30%.

13.name: Friend or Foe
13.description: Can use Dive on allies (but you will not flip). When used this way, the cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

13.name: Unbound
13.description: Ignore all collision while using Sweeping Strike, allowing you to go over walls and terrain.

13.name: Sixth Sense
13.description: Take 50% reduced damage from Abilities while Evasion is active.

16.name: Hunter's Onslaught
16.description: Abilities heal for 15% of damage dealt.

16.name: Second Sweep
16.description: Store up to 2 charges of Sweeping Strike.

16.name: Blood for Blood
16.description: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and heal for twice that amount.

16.name: Stoneskin
16.description: Activate to gain 30% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 5 seconds.

20.name: Demonic Form
20.description: Permanently remain in Demonic Form. Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Demonic Form to 30% and grants a 50% reduction in the duration of disabling effects. Illidan can mount in this form.

20.name: Nowhere to Hide
20.description: Grants global range.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

name: Jaina
title: Archmage
description: Has multiple area of effect damage spells. Slows and freezes her enemies.

Jaina.name: Frostbolt
Jaina.description: Deal 160 (+0.04 per level) damage and Chill the target.

Jaina.name: Blizzard
Jaina.description: Bombard an area with 2 waves of ice, dealing 167 (+0.04 per level) damage each. Damaged enemies are Chilled.

Jaina.name: Cone of Cold
Jaina.description: Deal 189 (+0.04 per level) damage and Chill targets.

Jaina.name: Summon Water Elemental
Jaina.description: Summons a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks do 78 (+0.04 per level) damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Water Elemental.  Lasts 20 seconds.

Jaina.name: Ring of Frost
Jaina.description: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 310 (+0.04 per level) damage and roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

Jaina.name: Frostbite
Jaina.description: All abilities Chill targets, slowing Movement Speed by 25% and amplifying damage from your abilities by 50%. Lasts 4 seconds.

1.name: Winter's Reach
1.description: Increases the range of Frostbolt by 30%.

1.name: Lingering Chill
1.description: Increases the duration of Chill from 4 seconds to 6 seconds.

1.name: Deep Chill
1.description: Increases the slow of Chill from 25% to 30%.

1.name: Conjurer's Pursuit
1.description: Collecting Regeneration Globes permanently increases Mana Regeneration by 0.1015 per second.

4.name: Frost Shards
4.description: Frostbolt will now pierce the first target to hit an additional target behind them.

4.name: Snowstorm
4.description: Increases the radius of Blizzard by 30%.

4.name: Arcane Intellect
4.description: Dealing damage to a Chilled target returns Mana to Jaina. Basic Attacks return 5 Mana and abilities return 25.

4.name: Envenom
4.description: Activate to poison an enemy Hero, dealing 352 (+0.44 per level) damage over 10 seconds.

7.name: Ice Floes
7.description: Doubles the width of Cone of Cold and causes each target hit to reduce its cooldown by 0.5 seconds.

7.name: Frostbitten
7.description: Increases the damage bonus of Frostbite from 50% to 65%.

7.name: Frost Armor
7.description: Enemy Heroes that attack you are Chilled. Additionally, every 8 seconds you can block the next Basic Attack from an enemy Hero reducing its damage by 75%

7.name: Ice Lance
7.description: The cooldown of Frostbolt is reduced by 2 seconds if it impacts a Chilled target.

10.name: Ring of Frost
10.description: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 310 (+0.04 per level) damage and roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

10.name: Summon Water Elemental
10.description: Summons a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks do 78 (+0.04 per level) damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Water Elemental.  Lasts 20 seconds.

13.name: Storm Front
13.description: Increases the cast range of Blizzard by 100%.

13.name: Improved Ice Block
13.description: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds. When this effect expires, nearby enemies are Chilled.

13.name: Icy Veins
13.description: Activate to make your Basic Abilities' cooldowns recharge three times as fast and reduce their Mana cost by 50% for 5 seconds.

16.name: Snow Crash
16.description: Increases the number of Blizzard waves from 2 to 3.

16.name: Northern Exposure
16.description: Enemies damaged by Cone of Cold are also afflicted with Vulnerable, increasing the damage they take by 25% for 2 seconds.

16.name: Numbing Blast
16.description: Cone of Cold also roots Chilled targets for 1 second.

16.name: Ice Barrier
16.description: When Jaina does increased damage from Frostbite, she is shielded for 25% of the total damage dealt. This Shield lasts 3 seconds.

20.name: Cold Snap
20.description: The center of the ring also explodes with frost after the first ring expires.

20.name: Wintermute
20.description: Increases the cast range of Water Elemental by 50%, and the Water Elemental will now mimic your Basic Abilities for 50% damage.

20.name: Arcane Power
20.description: Activate to instantly restore 400 Mana and increase Ability Power by 15% for 5 seconds.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

name: Johanna
title: Crusader of Zakarum
description: A front-line fighter that is resilient and can make herself immune to enemy crowd control.

Crusader.name: Punish
Crusader.description: Step forward dealing 113 (+0.04 per level) damage and slowing enemies by 60% decaying over 2 seconds.

Crusader.name: Condemn
Crusader.description: After 1 second, you pull nearby enemies toward you, stunning them for 0.25 seconds and dealing 55 (+0.04 per level) damage.

Crusader.name: Shield Glare
Crusader.description: Deal 59 (+0.04 per level) damage to enemies and cause them to miss Basic Attacks for 1.5 seconds.

Crusader.name: Falling Sword
Crusader.description:
You leap towards an area.  While in the air, you can steer the landing location by moving. 
After 2 seconds you land, dealing 251 (+0.04 per level) damage to nearby enemies and knocking them into the air.

Crusader.name: Blessed Shield
Crusader.description: Deal 114 (+0.04 per level) damage and stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 57 (+0.04 per level) damage and stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

Crusader.name: Iron Skin
Crusader.description: Gain a Shield that absorbs 613 (+0.04 per level) damage for 4 seconds. While this Shield is active, you are Unstoppable.

1.name: Regeneration Master
1.description: Collecting Regeneration Globes permanently increases Health Regeneration by 1.5 per second.

1.name: Reinforce
1.description: Using Basic Abilities reduces the next Basic Attack against you by 50%.  Maximum 2 stacks.

1.name: Righteous Smash
1.description: Punish restores 10 Mana per enemy hit.

1.name: Knight Takes Pawn
1.description: Condemn deals 165 (+0.12 per level) additional damage to Minions and Mercenaries and stuns them for 3 seconds.

4.name: Amplified Healing
4.description: Increases regeneration effects and all healing received by 30%.

4.name: Roar
4.description: Increases Punish damage by 50%.

4.name: Eternal Retaliation
4.description: Condemn's cooldown is lowered by 0.75 seconds for each enemy affected. Maximum of 10 targets.

4.name: Laws of Hope
4.description:
Regenerating 10 (+0.04 per level) Health per second.
Activate to heal 20% of your max Health over 4 seconds.

7.name: Battle Momentum
7.description: Basic Attacks reduce Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

7.name: Conviction
7.description: Movement Speed is increased by 25% while Condemn is charging up.

7.name: The Crusade Marches On
7.description: Basic and Heroic Abilities lower the cooldown of Iron Skin by 1.5 seconds.

7.name: Sins Exposed
7.description: Shield Glare marks enemies for 4 seconds. The next time any ally damages them, they take 68 (+0.04 per level) extra damage and the mark is removed.

10.name: Falling Sword
10.description:
You leap towards an area.  While in the air, you can steer the landing location by moving. 
After 2 seconds you land, dealing 251 (+0.04 per level) damage to nearby enemies and knocking them into the air.

10.name: Blessed Shield
10.description: Deal 114 (+0.04 per level) damage and stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 57 (+0.04 per level) damage and stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

13.name: Burning Rage
13.description: Deal 23 (+0.04 per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

13.name: Hold Your Ground
13.description: Increases Iron Skin's Shield by 20%, and if the Shield is destroyed by damage the cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds.

13.name: Subdue
13.description: Increases Punish's slow to 80% decaying over 3 seconds.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.description: Upon taking Ability Damage, reduce that damage and further Ability Damage by 50% for 3 seconds.  Can only trigger once every 30 seconds.

16.name: Holy Renewal
16.description: Every enemy Hero affected by Shield Glare heals you for 114 (+0.04 per level).

16.name: Blessed Hammer
16.description: Condemn also creates a hammer that spirals around you, dealing 41 (+0.04 per level) damage to enemies it hits.

16.name: Fanaticism
16.description: While Iron Skin is active, gain 8% Movement Speed each time you take damage.  Stacks up to 40%.

16.name: Imposing Presence
16.description: Enemies that attack you have their Attack Speed slowed by 40%.

20.name: Heaven's Fury
20.description: While in the air, holy bolts rain down on enemies dealing 75 (+0.04 per level) damage and reducing the cooldown of Falling Sword by 2 seconds for each enemy hit.

20.name: Radiating Faith
20.description: Increases Blessed Shield's stun duration by 33% and maximum enemies hit by 2.

20.name: Indestructible

20.name: Storm Shield
20.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

name: Kael'thas
title: The Sun King
description: A fire mage capable of empowering his Abilities in unique ways and dealing area of effect damage.

Kaelthas.name: Flamestrike
Kaelthas.description:
After a short delay, deal 237 (+0.04 per level) damage in an area. 
Verdant Spheres increases the radius by 50% and deals 356 (+0.04 per level) damage.

Kaelthas.name: Living Bomb
Kaelthas.description:
Deal 228 (+0.12 per level) damage over 3 seconds to an enemy, then they explode dealing 114 (+0.04 per level) damage to all nearby enemies. Casting a second Living Bomb on an enemy causes the previous Living Bomb to explode immediately.
Verdant Spheres makes this Ability cost no Mana and have no cooldown.

Kaelthas.name: Gravity Lapse
Kaelthas.description:
Stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds.

description: A slow moving front-line warrior that never truly dies, haunting the battlefield as a ghost before reforming on the field.

The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are stunned for 1.5 seconds. Lasts 15 seconds.
Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.

Olaf can charge enemies and slow their Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds by right-clicking on them. 8 second cooldown. 
Olaf gains increased Health Regeneration when out of combat for 4 seconds.

LostVikings.name: Select Baleog
LostVikings.description: Baleog's Basic Attacks deal 50% splash damage to enemies behind his attack target.

LostVikings.name: Viking Hoard
LostVikings.description:
Gathering a Regeneration Globe with a Viking permanently increases all their Health Regeneration by 0.5 per second.
Current Bonus: 1 Regen per second

LostVikings.name: Select All Vikings
LostVikings.description: The Lost Vikings can be controlled individually or as a group. Each Viking has particular strengths.

LostVikings.name: Go Go Go!
LostVikings.description: The Vikings gain 30% increased Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

1.name: Olaf the Stout
1.description: Every 8 seconds Olaf can block a Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 75%.  Can store up to 2 charges.

1.name: Spy Games
1.description: After standing still for 3 seconds, Erik gains Stealth and his Sight Radius is increased by 75%. The Stealth persists for 3 seconds after moving.

1.name: Explosive Attacks
1.description: Increases Baleog's splash damage against non-Heroes to 100%.

1.name: Viking Bribery
1.description:
Enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries killed near your Hero grant you stacks of Viking Bribery. Use 40 stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum stacks available: 100.
Current number of Viking Bribery stacks: <d score="LostVikingsVikingBriberyStackScore"/>

4.name: Pain Don't Hurt
4.description: Baleog's Basic Attacks and splash damage heal for 20% of the damage dealt. Healing is doubled against Heroes.

4.name: Erik the Swift
4.description: Permanently increases Erik's base Movement Speed by 10%, and as long as Erik is moving he heals 34 (+0.04 per level) Health per second.

4.name: It's a Sabotage!
4.description: Erik's Basic Attacks against Structures destroy 5 Ammo and deal 135 (+0.2 per level) damage over 10 seconds.

4.name: Mercenary Lord
4.description: Non-Boss Mercenaries near your hero deal 50% more damage. Reduces damage taken from Minions and Mercenaries by 50%.

7.name: Baleog the Fierce
7.description: Baleog's Basic Attacks increase his Attack Speed by 8%, stacking up to 5 times. After 3 seconds of not attacking, these stacks will rapidly decay.

7.name: Spin To Win!
7.description: Activate to have each Viking deal 101 (+0.04 per level) damage to nearby enemies.

7.name: Norse Force!
7.description: All Vikings gain a 110 (+0.04 per level) to 220 (+0.04 per level) point Shield, increasing in strength for each Viking alive. Lasts 4 seconds.

10.name: Longboat Raid!
10.description:
Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for 112 (+0.08 per level) damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals 205 (+0.04 per level) damage in an area.  The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are stunned for 1.5 seconds. Lasts 15 seconds.
Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.

10.name: Play Again!
10.description:
Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds. 
Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.

13.name: Hunka' Burning Olaf
13.description: Olaf deals 34 (+0.04 per level) damage every second to nearby enemies.

13.name: Jump!
13.description: Makes all Vikings Invulnerable and able to pass over enemies for 1.5 seconds.

13.name: Nordic Attack Squad
13.description: Activate to have all Viking Basic Attacks deal bonus damage equal to 1% of a Hero's maximum Health for 5 seconds.

16.name: Large and In Charge
16.description: When Olaf charges enemies, they are stunned for 1 second.

16.name: Impatience Is a Virtue
16.description: Enemies damaged by a Viking's Basic Attack reduce the cooldown of all Viking Abilities by 0.25 seconds.

16.name: 64 KB Marathon
16.description: Gain an additional 40% Movement Speed when activating Go Go Go! that decays over 4 seconds.  Additionally, the Vikings will break out of Roots and Slows.

16.name: Executioner
16.description: Basic Attacks deal 40% more damage against slowed, rooted, or stunned targets.

20.name: Ragnarok 'n' Roll!
20.description: The Longboat can attack two targets at once and the range of its Mortar is increased by 100%.

20.name: Checkpoint Reached
20.description: 10 seconds after using Play Again!, any dead Vikings are revived and summoned again, and all are healed to full.

20.name: The Sequel!
20.description: Reduces the Lost Vikings' death timer by 50%.

20.name: Fury of the Storm
20.description: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 41 (+0.04 per level) damage to the target, and 105 (+0.04 per level) damage to all nearby Minions and Mercenaries.  Each Viking has their own cooldown.

name: Lt. Morales
title: Combat Medic
description: A dedicated support that heals a single ally near her. Shields allies and knocks back enemies.

Medic.name: Healing Beam
Medic.description:
Heal an ally for 192 (+0.08 per level) health a second as long as they are in range. 
Reactivate to switch targets, or activate your Trait to cancel the channel.

Medic.name: Safeguard
Medic.description: Grant target ally Resistant, reducing damage taken by 25% for 3 seconds.

Medic.name: Displacement Grenade
Medic.description: Fire a grenade that explodes on the first enemy hit, dealing 210 (+0.04 per level) damage, knocking enemies away.

Medic.name: Stim Drone
Medic.description: Grant an allied Hero 75% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 10 seconds.

Medic.name: Medivac Dropship
Medic.description: Target a location for a Medivac transport. For up to 10.5 seconds before takeoff, allies can right-click to enter the Medivac.

Medic.name: Caduceus Reactor
Medic.description: Regenerate 3.12% of your maximum Health every second after not taking damage for 4 seconds.

1.name: Prolonged Safeguard
1.description: Increases Safeguard's duration by 1 second.

1.description: You gain an untalented Safeguard automatically if you take damage while below 50% Health. This effect has a 20 second cooldown.

1.name: Feedback Loop
1.description: When Safeguard expires, 45 Mana is refunded.

1.name: Scouting Drone
1.description: Places a Scouting Drone at target location, granting vision of a large area around it for 45 seconds. This drone cannot be hidden and is killed by enemies with 2 Basic Attacks.  Stores up to 2 charges.

4.name: Bioshield
4.description: If your target is at full Health, they gain a Shield that absorbs 78 (+0.04 per level) damage, stacking up to 5 times.

4.name: Advanced Block
4.description: Every 5 seconds, you can Block a Basic Attack from an enemy Hero reducing its damage by 50%.  Stores up to 3 charges.

4.name: Upgraded Ballistics
4.description: Displacement Grenade travels 50% faster and enemies directly impacted take 33% more damage.

4.name: Infused Grenade
4.description: Displacement Grenade's Mana cost is refunded if you hit an enemy Hero.

7.name: Clear!
7.description: Displacement Grenade's explosion radius increased by 33% and knocks back farther.

7.name: Irradiate
7.description: Enemies near your Healing Beam's target take 22 (+0.08 per level) damage a second.

7.name: Calldown: MULE
7.description: Activate to calldown a Mule that repairs Structures, one at a time, near target point for 40 seconds, healing for 100 Health every 1 second.  Grants 1 ammo every  3 seconds.

7.name: Cleanse
7.description: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on yourself.

10.name: Stim Drone
10.description: Grant an allied Hero 75% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 10 seconds.

10.name: Medivac Dropship
10.description: Target a location for a Medivac transport. For up to 10.5 seconds before takeoff, allies can right-click to enter the Medivac.

13.name: Intensive Care
13.description: When Healing Beam is on a single target for over 3 seconds, its healing amount increases by 25% and Mana cost increases by 4.

13.name: Couples Therapy
13.description: While channeling Healing Beam you are healed for 25% of the healing amount at the cost of an additional 4 Mana per second.

13.name: Preventative Care
13.description: Basic Attacks against your Healing Beam target reduce the attacker's Attack Speed by 25% for 2.5 seconds.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.description: Upon taking Ability Damage, reduce that damage and further Ability Damage by 50% for 3 seconds.  Can only trigger once every 30 seconds.

16.name: Inoculation
16.description: Increases Safeguard's initial damage reduction to 50% for the first 1.5 seconds.

16.name: Shield Sequencer
16.description: After casting Safeguard, you can cast it a second time within 3 seconds at no cost.

16.name: System Shock
16.description: Displacement Grenade slows enemies by 50% for 4 seconds. The slow amount decays over its duration.

16.name: Second Opinion
16.description: Reduces Displacement Grenade's cooldown by 2 seconds and it now holds a second charge.

20.name: Transfusion
20.description: Increases the duration of Stim Drone by 2 seconds.  You also gain the effect of Stim Drone when cast on an ally.

20.name: Medbay
20.description: Medivac heals nearby allies and everyone aboard for 137 (+0.04 per level) Health per second.

20.name: Caduceus Reactor 2.0
20.description: While Caduceus Reactor is active you restore 8 Mana a second and gain a Shield that absorbs 96 (+0.04 per level) damage, stacking up to 5 times.

20.name: Storm Shield
20.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

name: Lunara
title: First Daughter of Cenarius
description: A fragile and slippery Dryad who gallops across the battlefield, poisoning enemies to wear them down over time.

Dryad.name: Noxious Blossom
Dryad.description: After 0.5 seconds, cause an area to explode with pollen dealing 160 (+0.04 per level) damage.

Dryad.name: Crippling Spores
Dryad.description: Enemies currently afflicted by Nature's Toxin have its duration increased by 3 seconds and are slowed by 40% decaying over 3 seconds.

Dryad.name: Wisp
Dryad.description: Spawn a Wisp to scout an area. Can be redirected once active. Lasts 45 seconds.

Dryad.name: Thornwood Vine
Dryad.description: Send forth vines that deal 164 (+0.04 per level) damage to all enemies in a line. Can hold 3 charges.

Dryad.name: Leaping Strike
Dryad.description: Leap over an enemy, slowing them by 80% for 0.35 seconds and attacking for 246 (+0.04 per level) damage. Has 2 charges.

Dryad.description: Your Basic Attacks and damaging Abilities poison their target, dealing 34 (+0.05 per level) damage a second for 3 seconds. Every additional application increases the duration by 3 seconds, up to a maximum of 9 seconds.

1.name: Blossom Swell
1.description: Increases Noxious Blossom's radius by 20%.

1.description: Crippling Spores returns 8 Mana per enemy hit, up to 40 Mana.

1.description: Nature's Toxin reveals enemies for its duration.

4.description: Wisp costs no Mana and its cooldown recharges 100% faster while no Wisp is active.

4.description: Wisp can see over obstacles and reveals the area for 4 seconds after dying.

4.description: The first time you relocate a Wisp it leaves a copy of itself in the previous location. Only one Dividing Wisp can be active at a time.

7.name: Siphoning Toxin
7.description: As long as you have Nature's Toxin active on an enemy you heal for 18 (+0.04 per level) Health a second.

13.name: Greater Spell Shield
13.description: Upon taking Ability Damage, reduce that damage and further Ability Damage by 75% for 3 seconds.  Can only trigger once every 30 seconds.

16.description: Increases Noxious Blossom damage by 50% against enemies afflicted with Nature's Toxin.

16.name: Star Wood Spear
16.description: Using Crippling Spores increases your Basic Attacks range by 50% for 6 seconds.

16.name: Invigorating Spores

16.name: Let Them Wither
16.description: Increases Crippling Spores' slow to 60%.

20.description: Increases Thornwood Vine's range by 30%, its speed by 20%, and your vision radius by 35%.

20.name: Boundless Stride
20.description: All Leaping Strike charges are returned every 20 seconds. You can also use Leaping Strike on allies.

1.description: Reduces Innervate's cooldown by 10 seconds.

4.description: Increases the Mana return of Innervate to 30%.

4.description: Entangling Roots also spawns a Treant that does 64 (+0.04000000000001 per level) damage per second and lasts 10 seconds.

7.name: Enduring Growth
7.description: Increases the duration of Regrowth by 6 seconds.

7.name: Strangling Vines
7.description: Entangling Roots deals 100% more damage.

7.description: Activate to calldown a Mule that repairs Structures, one at a time, near target point for 40 seconds, healing for 100 Health every 1 second.  Grants 1 ammo every  3 seconds.

7.description: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on yourself.

10.name: Tranquility
10.description: Heals 80 (+0.08 per level) Health per second to nearby allies over 10 seconds.

10.name: Twilight Dream
10.description: After a short delay, deal 374 (+0.04 per level) damage in a large area around you, silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for 3 seconds.

13.name: Full Moonfire
13.description: Increases Moonfire's radius by 60% and reduces its Mana cost by 50%.

13.name: Shrink Ray
13.description: Activate to reduce an enemy Hero's damage by 50% and Movement Speed by 50% for 4 seconds.

13.name: Ice Block
13.description: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds.

16.description: While above 80% life, your Basic Ability cooldowns regenerate 50% faster.

16.name: Tenacious Roots
16.description: Entangling Roots grows 25% larger, lasts 25% longer, and roots targets for 0.5 seconds longer.

20.description: Increases Tranquility's healing by 25% and it also restores 5 Mana per second.

20.name: Nightmare
20.description: Increases Twilight Dream's silence duration to 4 seconds and it also slows enemies by 50%.

20.name: Storm Shield
20.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

20.name: Rewind
20.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm

name: Muradin
title: Mountain King
description: Jumps around the battlefield and stuns Heroes. Rapidly regenerates Health as he nears death.

7.name: Piercing Bolt

name: Murky

description: Effective against groups of enemies by summoning Spiders, Zombies, and Frogs.  Siphons Health and Mana from dying foes.

Ability and attack damage poisons enemies for 44 (+0.16 per level) additional damage over 4 seconds.

20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

name: Nova
title: Dominion Ghost
description: Automatically cloaks while out of combat. Snipes enemies from afar, and creates Decoys of herself to fool enemies.

Nova.name: Snipe
Nova.description: Deals 268 (+0.04 per level) damage to the first enemy hit.

Nova.description: Deal 110 (+0.04 per level) damage to an enemy and slow it by 30% for 2.25 seconds.

Nova.description:
Create a Decoy for 5 seconds that appears to attack enemies. 
Using this Ability does not break Cloak.

Nova.name: Triple Tap
Nova.description: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for 338 (+0.04 per level) damage each.

Nova.name: Precision Strike
Nova.description: After a 1.5 second delay, deals 456 (+0.04 per level) damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.

Nova.description:
Gain Stealth when out of combat for 3 seconds. Taking damage, attacking, using Abilities, or channeling reveals you.
Basic Attack range is 20% further than other ranged Heroes, and you see 10% further than other Heroes.

1.description: While Cloaked, Nova gains 4</C> Mana per second.

1.description: Increases your Movement Speed by 30% while Cloaked.

name: Raynor
title: Renegade Commander
description: A resilient Hero that knocks back enemies and buffs allies. Able to regenerate Health quickly when in trouble.

Raynor.name: Penetrating Round

Raynor.description: Gain 30% bonus Attack Speed for 6 seconds. Nearby allies gain half of the bonus.

Raynor.name: Adrenaline Rush

Raynor.name: Hyperion
Raynor.description: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run dealing 66 (+0.04 per level) damage a second, hitting up to 4 enemies. Also occasionally fires its Yamato Cannon on Structures for 794 (+0.04 per level) damage. Lasts 12 seconds.

name: Rehgar
title: Shaman of the Earthen Ring
description: Transforms into a spirit wolf instead of mounting. Slows enemies, heals allies, and grants them a damaging shield.

1.description: Increases the radius of Lightning Shield by 33%.

name: Sonya
title: Wandering Barbarian
description: A direct fighter who uses Fury instead of Mana. Leeches life from enemies by attacking and using Abilities.
