Barbarian.name: Fury
Barbarian.description: Use Fury instead of Mana, which is gained by taking or dealing damage. Using a Basic or Heroic Ability grants 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

1.name: War Paint
1.description: Basic Attacks heal you for 30% of the damage dealt.

1.name: Block
1.description: Every 5 seconds, you can Block a Basic Attack from an enemy Hero reducing its damage by 50%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

1.name: Endless Fury
1.description: Increases maximum Fury to 200.

1.name: Shot of Fury
1.description: Activate to gain 50 Fury. Usable while Whirlwinding.

4.name: Focused Attack
4.description: Every 10 seconds, your next Basic Attack against a Hero deals 60% additional damage. Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second.

4.name: Shattered Ground
4.description: Increases Seismic Slam splash damage to 75% of primary target damage.

4.name: Hurricane
4.description: Casting Whirlwind removes all slows and roots.

4.name: Mercenary Lord
4.description: Non-Boss Mercenaries near your hero deal 50% more damage. Reduces damage taken from Minions and Mercenaries by 50%.

7.name: Poisoned Spear
7.description: Ancient Spear deals an additional 75% damage over 4 seconds.

7.name: Composite Spear
7.description: Increases the range of Ancient Spear by 30%.

7.name: Follow Through
7.description: After using an ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

7.name: Ferocious Healing
7.description:
Consume 20 Fury to heal 10.15% of your maximum Health.
Usable while Whirlwinding.

10.name: Leap
10.description: Leap into the air, dealing 123 (+0.04 per level) damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

10.name: Wrath of the Berserker
10.description: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of silences, stuns, slows, roots, and polymorphs against you by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.

13.name: Life Funnel
13.description: Increases the healing of Whirlwind to 25%.

13.name: Aftershock
13.description: Using Seismic Slam reduces its Fury cost by 50% for 2 seconds.

13.name: Mystical Spear
13.description: Reduces the cooldown of Ancient Spear by 4 seconds. You are pulled to the target location even if you don't hit an enemy.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.description: Upon taking Ability Damage, reduce that damage and further Ability Damage by 50% for 3 seconds.  Can only trigger once every 30 seconds.

16.name: Furious Blow
16.description: Increases Seismic Slam damage by 40%, but costs 35 Fury.

16.name: No Escape
16.description: Increases the Movement Speed bonus from using Basic and Heroic Abilities to 25%.

16.name: Imposing Presence
16.description: Enemies that attack you have their Attack Speed slowed by 40%.

16.name: Nerves of Steel
16.description: Activate to gain 30% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 5 seconds. Usable while Whirlwinding.

20.name: Arreat Crater
20.description: Leap leaves behind an impassable crater for 5 seconds.

20.name: Anger Management
20.description: Increases Wrath of the Berserker's reduction of disables to 75%, and also increases all Fury generated during Wrath by 50%.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

20.name: Ignore Pain
20.description: Activate to reduce damage taken by 75% for 4 seconds. Usable while Whirlwinding.

name: Stitches
title: Terror of Darkshire
description: A heavy front-line fighter that can use Hook to drag enemies to him. Emits a gas cloud when he takes damage.

Stitches.name: Hook
Stitches.description: Pull the first enemy hit towards you, temporarily stunning them and dealing 91 (+0.04 per level) damage.

Stitches.name: Slam
Stitches.description: Deal 96 (+0.04 per level) damage to enemies within the target area.

Stitches.name: Devour
Stitches.description: Deal 319 (+0.04 per level) damage to non-Heroic units, or 114 (+0.04 per level) damage to Heroes. Restores 19.92% of your maximum Health.

Stitches.name: Putrid Bile
Stitches.description: Emit bile that deals 37 (+0.04 per level) damage per second to enemies within, slowing them by 35%. You gain 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.

Stitches.name: Gorge
Stitches.description:
Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for 4 seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes 274 (+0.04 per level) damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources. 
Cannot be used on massive Heroes.

Stitches.name: Vile Gas
Stitches.description: When damaged, Stitches emits a gas cloud that persists for 4 seconds.  Enemies who enter it are poisoned for 18 (+0.04 per level) damage per second for 3 seconds.

1.name: Chew Your Food
1.description: Using Devour also heals you for 9.555% of your max Health over 3.0625 seconds.

1.name: Dampen Magic
1.description: Every 8 seconds, gain a charge that reduces the damage received from the next enemy Ability by 50%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

1.name: Hungry for More
1.description: Collecting Regeneration Globes permanently increases your maximum Health by 30.

1.name: Heavy Slam
1.description: Slam damage increased by 50%

4.name: Amplified Healing
4.description: Increases regeneration effects and all healing received by 30%.

4.name: Mercenary Lord
4.description: Non-Boss Mercenaries near your hero deal 50% more damage. Reduces damage taken from Minions and Mercenaries by 50%.

4.name: Vile Cleaver
4.description: Basic Attacks create a cloud of Vile Gas on the target.

4.name: Putrid Ground
4.description: Enemies hit by Slam are infected with Vile Gas.

7.name: Savor the Flavor
7.description: Using Devour on an enemy Hero permanently increases your Health Regeneration by 2 per second.

7.name: Last Bite
7.description: If an enemy dies within 3 seconds of being damaged by Devour, its cooldown is reduced by 15 seconds.

7.name: Tenderizer
7.description: Basic Attacks slow enemy Movement Speed by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

7.name: Toxic Gas
7.description: Increases Vile Gas radius by 50% and the duration of the effect by 1 second.

10.name: Putrid Bile
10.description: Emit bile that deals 37 (+0.04 per level) damage per second to enemies within, slowing them by 35%. You gain 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.

10.name: Gorge
10.description:
Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for 4 seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes 274 (+0.04 per level) damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources. 
Cannot be used on massive Heroes.

13.name: Relentless
13.description: Reduces the duration of silences, stuns, slows, and roots against your Hero by 50%.

13.name: Mega Smash
13.description: Range and arc of Slam increased by 25%.

13.name: Indigestion
13.description: Using Devour also creates a Retchling that applies Vile Gas Poison when it attacks.

13.name: Helping Hand
13.description: Hook can also pull allied Heroes (but will not damage them). When used to pull allies, the cooldown is reduced by 50%.

16.name: Pulverize
16.description: Decreases Slam's cooldown by 2 seconds and it also slows enemies by 75% for 1 second.

16.name: Fishing Hook
16.description: Hook has an additional 40% range.

16.name: Shish Kabob
16.description: Hook can pull up to 2 targets.

16.name: Stoneskin
16.description: Activate to gain 30% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 5 seconds.

20.name: Regenerative Bile
20.description: Putrid Bile lasts 2 seconds longer, grants an additional 10% Movement Speed and heals for 48.6486% (+0.0555% per level) of the damage dealt.

20.name: Hungry Hungry Stitches
20.description: While active, Gorge can be repeatedly recast until the first target is expelled. Increases Gorge damage by 40%.

20.name: Hardened Shield
20.description: Activate to reduce damage taken by 75% for 4 seconds.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

name: Sylvanas
title: The Banshee Queen
description: Disables enemy Minions and Structures. Killing enemies replenishes her Withering Fire for continuous damage.

Sylvanas.name: Withering Fire
Sylvanas.description:
Shoot the closest enemy for 39 (+0.04 per level) damage, preferring Heroes.  Stores 5 charges.
Gain 1 charge on nearby enemy Minion or Mercenary deaths, and 3 charges on nearby enemy Hero deaths.

Sylvanas.name: Shadow Dagger
Sylvanas.description: Deals 37 (+0.04 per level) damage and an additional 148 (+0.16 per level) damage over 2 seconds to target unit. The effect spreads to nearby targets.

Sylvanas.name: Haunting Wave
Sylvanas.description: Send forth a wave of banshees dealing 114 (+0.04 per level) damage to all targets. Reactivate to teleport to the banshees' location.

Sylvanas.name: Wailing Arrow
Sylvanas.description: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 228 (+0.04 per level) damage and Silencing enemies in an area making them unable to use Abilities for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically when it reaches maximum range.

Sylvanas.name: Possession
Sylvanas.description: Force an enemy Minion to fight for you. It gains 20% Attack Damage. Costs 5 charges to convert a Catapult Minion.

Sylvanas.name: Black Arrows
Sylvanas.description: Basic Attacks and Abilities stun Minions, Mercenaries, and Structures for 1 second.

1.name: With the Wind
1.description: Increases Withering Fire's range by 25%.

1.name: Lost Soul
1.description: Reduces the cooldown of Shadow Dagger by 2 seconds.

1.name: Barbed Shot
1.description: Withering Fire deals 200% bonus damage to non-Heroic units.

1.name: Corruption
1.description: Basic Attacks against Structures destroy 2 Ammunition.

4.name: Paralysis
4.description: Increases duration of Black Arrows by 100%

4.name: Overflowing Quiver
4.description: Whenever you would gain a Withering Fire charge from killing a Minion or Hero while at maximum charges, it is automatically fired.

4.name: Ranger's Ambush
4.description: Using Haunting Wave to teleport refills all charges of Withering Fire.

4.name: Envenom
4.description: Activate to poison an enemy Hero, dealing 352 (+0.44 per level) damage over 10 seconds.

7.name: Unstable Poison
7.description: Minions that die under the effects of Black Arrows explode, dealing 116 (+0.04 per level) damage to nearby enemies.

7.name: Life Drain
7.description: Shadow Dagger heals you for 37 (+0.04 per level) each time it spreads to a new enemy.

7.name: Remorseless
7.description: After using an ability, your next Basic Attack within 3 seconds deals 25% additional damage.

7.name: Shade Form
7.description: Haunting Wave grants Stealth for 3 seconds. Activating the teleport does not break the Stealth.

10.name: Wailing Arrow
10.description: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 228 (+0.04 per level) damage and Silencing enemies in an area making them unable to use Abilities for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically when it reaches maximum range.

10.name: Possession
10.description: Force an enemy Minion to fight for you. It gains 20% Attack Damage. Costs 5 charges to convert a Catapult Minion.

13.name: Overwhelming Affliction
13.description: Black Arrows now also applies to Heroes, slowing their Movement Speed by 5% for the duration. Stacks up to 5 times.

13.name: Evasive Fire
13.description: You gain 10% Movement Speed for 2 seconds whenever an enemy is hit with Withering Fire, stacking up to 30%.

13.name: Splinter Shot
13.description: Withering Fire hits a second target for 29 (+0.04 per level) damage.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.description: Upon taking Ability Damage, reduce that damage and further Ability Damage by 50% for 3 seconds.  Can only trigger once every 30 seconds.

16.name: Windrunner
16.description: After you teleport from Haunting Wave, you can cast a second one for free within 2 seconds.

16.name: Cold Embrace
16.description: Shadow Dagger makes enemies Vulnerable, taking 25% more damage, but the range of Shadow Dagger is reduced by 25%.

16.name: Will of the Forsaken
16.description: Activate to become Unstoppable and gain 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

16.name: Blood for Blood
16.description: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and heal for twice that amount.

20.name: Deafening Blast
20.description: Enemies at the center of Wailing Arrow's explosion take 50% more damage and are silenced for twice as long.

20.name: Dark Lady's Call
20.description: Increases Possession's maximum charges by 3, reduces its recharge time by 4 seconds, and 5 charges can be used to convert enemy Mercenaries.  Does not work on Bosses.

20.name: Fury of the Storm
20.description: Every 5 seconds, your next basic attack will deal an additional 91 (+0.04 per level) damage to the target, and 228 (+0.04 per level) damage to all nearby Minions and Mercenaries.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

name: Tassadar
title: Savior of the Templar
description: Can grant a temporary Shield to allies, detect nearby enemy Heroes, and manipulate the battlefield for his team.

Tassadar.name: Plasma Shield
Tassadar.description: Grant a Shield that absorbs 342 (+0.04 per level) damage over 5 seconds. The Shield is 50% stronger when cast on another allied Hero.

Tassadar.name: Psionic Storm
Tassadar.description: Deal 110 (+0.08 per level) damage per second to enemies in target area for 3 seconds.

Tassadar.name: Dimensional Shift
Tassadar.description: Become invulnerable and fully invisible for 1.5 seconds.

Tassadar.name: Archon
Tassadar.description: Transform into an Archon, gaining a 456 (+0.04 per level) point Shield, causing Basic Attacks to deal 111 (+0.04 per level) damage and splash for 55 (+0.04 per level) additional damage. Lasts for 12.5 seconds.

Tassadar.name: Force Wall
Tassadar.description: Create a wall that blocks all units from moving through it for 2.5 seconds.

Tassadar.name: Oracle
Tassadar.description: Greatly increases your vision radius and allows you to detect enemy Heroes. Lasts for 5 seconds.

1.name: Conjurer's Pursuit
1.description: Collecting Regeneration Globes permanently increases Mana Regeneration by 0.1015 per second.

1.name: Overload
1.description: Increases Psionic Storm's range by 33%.

1.name: Psi-Infusion
1.description: Psionic Storm returns 5 Mana for each target initally hit.

1.name: Reinforce Structure
1.description: Plasma Shield is 100% stronger and lasts 100% longer when cast on Structures.

4.name: Leeching Plasma
4.description: While Plasma Shield is active, 30% of the target's Basic Attack damage against the primary target is returned as Health.

4.name: Mental Acuity
4.description: Reduces the cooldown of Oracle by 20 seconds.

4.name: Healing Ward
4.description: Activate to place a ward on the ground that heals allies in an area for 1.95% of their maximum Health every second for 10 seconds.

4.name: Promote
4.description: Activate to cause an allied lane Minion to take 75% reduced damage from non-Heroic targets and deal 100% bonus damage to non-Heroic targets for 30 seconds. Has 2 charges.

7.name: Khala's Embrace
7.description: If Plasma Shield expires, 50% of the Shield remains indefinitely. This effect does not stack.

7.name: Deep Shift
7.description: Dimensional Shift duration increased by 1.5 seconds.

7.name: Static Charge
7.description: Enemies damaged by Psionic Storm are marked with Static Charge. Your Basic Attacks consume the Static Charge to deal 52 (+0.04 per level) damage.

7.name: Calldown: MULE
7.description: Activate to calldown a Mule that repairs Structures, one at a time, near target point for 40 seconds, healing for 100 Health every 1 second.  Grants 1 ammo every  3 seconds.

10.name: Archon
10.description: Transform into an Archon, gaining a 456 (+0.04 per level) point Shield, causing Basic Attacks to deal 111 (+0.04 per level) damage and splash for 55 (+0.04 per level) additional damage. Lasts for 12.5 seconds.

10.name: Force Wall
10.description: Create a wall that blocks all units from moving through it for 2.5 seconds.

13.name: Distortion Beam
13.description: Basic Attacks slow enemies by 20% for 1.5 seconds.

13.name: Prescience
13.description: Dimensional Shift will automatically activate when you fall below 15% Health. This effect has a separate 45 second cooldown.

13.name: Scryer
13.description: Oracle duration increased by 3 seconds and grants 20% increased Movement Speed.

13.name: Shrink Ray
13.description: Activate to reduce an enemy Hero's damage by 50% and Movement Speed by 50% for 4 seconds.

16.name: Evasive Shielding
16.description: The target of your Plasma Shield also gains 25% Movement Speed for 5 seconds.

16.name: Dimensional Warp
16.description: While Dimensional Shifted, gain 50% Movement Speed and heal for 384 (+0.08 per level) Health.

16.name: Resonation
16.description: Psionic Storm targets are slowed by 25% for 1 second.

16.name: Second Strike
16.description: After casting Psionic Storm, you may cast Psionic Storm again for free within 3 seconds. The damage does not stack.

20.name: Twilight Archon
20.description: Increases Archon's initial Shield and Attack Damage by 50%, and increases Basic Attack range in Archon form by 35%.

20.name: Force Barrier
20.description: Force Wall range increased by 50% and duration by 1 second.

20.name: Storm Shield
20.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

20.name: Rewind
20.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

name: Thrall
title: Warchief of the Horde
description: Melee heavy hitter with powerful Lightning and Earth spells. Heals himself through Ability casts.

Thrall.name: Chain Lightning
Thrall.description: Deal 178 (+0.04 per level) damage to an enemy and half that amount to 2 nearby enemies.

Thrall.name: Feral Spirit
Thrall.description: Send out a Feral Spirit that deals 153 (+0.04 per level) damage to enemies in its path. Upon hitting an enemy Hero, the wolf stops and roots that hero in place for 1 second.

Thrall.name: Windfury
Thrall.description: Increase your Movement Speed by 30% for 4 seconds. Your next 3 Basic Attacks occur 100% faster.

Thrall.name: Sundering
Thrall.description: After a short delay, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 274 (+0.04 per level) damage and shoving enemies to the side, stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

Thrall.name: Earthquake
Thrall.description: Summon a massive Earthquake that periodically slows enemies in the area by 70%. Lasts for 10 seconds.

Thrall.name: Frostwolf Resilience
Thrall.description: Dealing damage with Abilities grants 1 stack of Frostwolf Resilience. At 5 stacks, you are instantly healed for 301 (+0.04 per level) Health.

1.name: Block
1.description: Every 5 seconds, you can Block a Basic Attack from an enemy Hero reducing its damage by 50%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

1.name: Rolling Thunder
1.description: Increases Chain Lightning's range by 30% and attacking enemies recently hit by Chain Lightning restores 10 Mana.

1.name: Rabid Wolves
1.description: Damaging Heroes with Feral Spirit grants 3 stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.

1.name: Seasoned Marksman
1.description: For every 6 enemy Minion kills near your Hero, gain 1 Basic Attack damage. Hero Takedowns count as 3 Minion kills.

4.name: Ride The Lightning
4.description: Chain Lightning can hit 2 additional enemies for 50% damage.

4.name: Spirit Journey
4.description: Feral Spirit travels 50% farther.

4.name: Mana Tide
4.description: Frostwolf Resilience also restores 15 Mana.

4.name: Envenom
4.description: Activate to poison an enemy Hero, dealing 352 (+0.44 per level) damage over 10 seconds.

7.name: Wind Shear
7.description: Reduces the cooldown of Windfury by 4 seconds.

7.name: Stone Wolves
7.description: Increases the duration of Feral Spirit's root from 1 second to 1.5 seconds.

7.name: Follow Through
7.description: After using an ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

7.name: Frostwolf's Grace
7.description: Frostwolf Resilience can be activated to immediately heal you.

10.name: Sundering
10.description: After a short delay, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 274 (+0.04 per level) damage and shoving enemies to the side, stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

10.name: Earthquake
10.description: Summon a massive Earthquake that periodically slows enemies in the area by 70%. Lasts for 10 seconds.

13.name: Restless Wolves
13.description: If Feral Spirit hits an enemy Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 50%.

13.name: Grace Of Air
13.description: Windfury attacks grant twice as many stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.

13.name: Giant Killer
13.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.description: Upon taking Ability Damage, reduce that damage and further Ability Damage by 50% for 3 seconds.  Can only trigger once every 30 seconds.

16.name: Forked Lightning
16.description: Allows Chain Lightning to hold 2 charges that can be used in quick succession.

16.name: Tempest Fury
16.description: The final strike of Windfury hits 3 times for 75% normal damage.

16.name: Ride The Wind
16.description: Increases Windfury's Movement Speed bonus from 30% to 40%. Windfury attacks increase the Movement Speed duration by 1 second.

16.name: Blood for Blood
16.description: Activate to deal 10% of target enemy Hero's Max Health and heal for twice that amount.

20.name: Worldbreaker
20.description: Sundering travels indefinitely.

20.name: Earthen Shields
20.description: You and your allies within the Earthquake area gain a Shield equal to 15% of max Health each pulse. This shield lasts 4 seconds.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

name: Tychus
title: Notorious Outlaw
description: Attacks enemies with a rapid firing Minigun that ramps up to full speed.

Tychus.name: Overkill
Tychus.description: Deal 860 (+0.8 per level) damage to the target and 420 (+0.8 per level) damage to nearby targets over 5 seconds. Reactivate to select a new target.  Can move and use Abilities while channeling.

Tychus.name: Frag Grenade
Tychus.description: Lob a grenade that deals 256 (+0.04 per level) damage, knocking enemies away.

Tychus.name: Run and Gun
Tychus.description: Charge forward and instantly wind up the Minigun.

Tychus.name: Drakken Laser Drill
Tychus.description: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 142 (+0.08 per level) damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.

Tychus.name: Commandeer Odin
Tychus.description: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 60% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. Lasts 23 seconds.

Tychus.name: Minigun
Tychus.description: Your Attack Speed increases the longer that you attack, becoming fully wound up after 4 Basic Attacks.  Lasts 3 seconds.

TychusOdin.name: Annihilate
TychusOdin.description: Fire the Odin's cannons in a straight line, dealing 196 (+0.04 per level) damage to everything in the path.

TychusOdin.name: Ragnarok Missiles
TychusOdin.description: Launches a missile at each nearby enemy, dealing 141 (+0.04 per level) damage.

1.name: Armor Piercing Rounds
1.description: Overkill's damage to the primary target increased by 20%.

1.name: Shredder Grenade
1.description: Increases the explosion radius of Frag Grenade by 25%.

1.name: Dash
1.description: Increases the range of Run and Gun by 25%.

1.name: Regeneration Master
1.description: Collecting Regeneration Globes permanently increases Health Regeneration by 1.5 per second.

1.name: Scouting Drone
1.description: Places a Scouting Drone at target location, granting vision of a large area around it for 45 seconds. This drone cannot be hidden and is killed by enemies with 2 Basic Attacks.  Stores up to 2 charges.

4.name: Focused Attack
4.description: Every 10 seconds, your next Basic Attack against a Hero deals 60% additional damage. Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second.

4.name: Vampiric Assault
4.description: Basic Attacks heal for 15% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

4.name: Spray 'n' Pray
4.description: Overkill's range increased by 15%.

4.name: Melting Point
4.description: Frag Grenade deals an additional 370 (+0.4 per level) damage over 10 seconds to Minions and Structures.

7.name: Quarterback
7.description: Increases the range of Frag Grenade by 50%.

7.name: Rapid Fire
7.description: Minigun stacks 2 additional times, further increasing your Attack Speed.

7.name: First Aid
7.description: Activate to heal 35.49% of your max Health over 6 seconds.

7.name: Sizzlin' Attacks
7.description: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 50% for 5 seconds. Each attack costs 5 Mana.

10.name: Commandeer Odin
10.description: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 60% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. Lasts 23 seconds.

10.name: Drakken Laser Drill
10.description: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 142 (+0.08 per level) damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.

13.name: Problem Solver
13.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 0.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

13.name: Lead Rain
13.description: Overkill applies a stacking slow, up to 20%.

13.name: Stim Pack
13.description: After using Run and Gun, gain 20% Attack Speed and 20% Movement Speed for 3 seconds

13.name: Relentless
13.description: Reduces the duration of silences, stuns, slows, and roots against your Hero by 50%.

16.name: Executioner
16.description: Basic Attacks deal 40% more damage against slowed, rooted, or stunned targets.

16.name: Lock and Load
16.description: While the Minigun is wound up, gain 15% increased Move Speed.

16.name: Concussion Grenade
16.description: Increases the knockback of Frag Grenade by 100%.

16.name: Stoneskin
16.description: Activate to gain 30% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 5 seconds.

20.name: Big Red Button
20.description: Odin lasts 50% longer and Ragnarok Missiles also launches a Nuclear Missile.

20.name: Focusing Diodes
20.description: Increases the range of the Drakken Laser Drill by 50%.  Deals increased damage the longer it remains on a single target, up to 100% extra damage.

20.name: Nexus Frenzy
20.description: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Attack Range by 20%.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

name: Tyrael
title: Archangel of Justice
description: Strong front-line Hero that can support his allies, Shielding them and increasing their Movement Speed. Explodes when he dies damaging nearby enemies.

Tyrael.name: El'Druin's Might
Tyrael.description: Deals 110 (+0.04 per level) damage to enemies within target area, slowing them by 25%. Reactivating will teleport you to the blade and slow nearby enemies by 25%.

Tyrael.name: Righteousness
Tyrael.description: Shields you for 319 (+0.04 per level) damage and nearby allies for 128 (+0.04 per level) damage for 4 seconds.

Tyrael.name: Smite
Tyrael.description: Rake target area for 144 (+0.04 per level) damage. Allies moving through the targeted area gain 25% increased Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

Tyrael.name: Judgment
Tyrael.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero dealing 100 (+0.04 per level) damage and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 50 (+0.04 per level) damage.

Tyrael.name: Sanctification
Tyrael.description: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.

Tyrael.name: Archangel's Wrath
Tyrael.description: When you die, become invulnerable and explode for 456 (+0.04 per level) damage after 3.5 seconds.

1.name: Protection in Death
1.description: When Archangel's Wrath explodes, shield nearby allies for 50% of their max Health for 5 seconds.

1.name: Horadric Reforging
1.description: If El'druins Might hits an enemy, its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

1.name: Purge Evil
1.description: Smite deals 25% more damage to Heroes.

1.name: Regeneration Master
1.description: Collecting Regeneration Globes permanently increases Health Regeneration by 1.5 per second.

4.name: Amplified Healing
4.description: Increases regeneration effects and all healing received by 30%.

4.name: Vampiric Strike
